Hi. Can anyone please help me fix this error? I tried deleting Manifest.toml in the example package, it didn't work.
```ERROR: Unsatisfiable requirements detected for package Flux [587475ba]:
 Flux [587475ba] log:
 ├─possible versions are: 0.12.0 or uninstalled
 ├─Flux [587475ba] is fixed to version 0.12.0-dev
 └─found to have no compatible versions left with Metalhead [dbeba491] 
   └─Metalhead [dbeba491] log:
     ├─possible versions are: [0.3.0, 0.4.0, 0.5.0-0.5.2] or uninstalled
     ├─restricted to versions * by an explicit requirement, leaving only versions [0.3.0, 0.4.0, 0.5.0-0.5.2]
     └─restricted by compatibility requirements with Images [916415d5] to versions: [0.4.0, 0.5.0-0.5.2] or uninstalled, leaving only versions: [0.4.0, 0.5.0-0.5.2]
       └─Images [916415d5] log:
         ├─possible versions are: [0.17.3, 0.18.0, 0.19.0-0.19.3, 0.20.0-0.20.2, 0.21.0-0.21.1, 0.22.0-0.22.5, 0.23.0-0.23.3] or uninstalled
         ├─restricted to versions * by MyExamplePackage [2153695d], leaving only versions [0.17.3, 0.18.0, 0.19.0-0.19.3, 0.20.0-0.20.2, 0.21.0-0.21.1, 0.22.0-0.22.5, 0.23.0-0.23.3]
         │ └─MyExamplePackage [2153695d] log:
         │   ├─possible versions are: 0.1.0 or uninstalled
         │   └─MyExamplePackage [2153695d] is fixed to version 0.1.0
         └─restricted by compatibility requirements with StatsBase [2913bbd2] to versions: [0.22.1-0.22.5, 0.23.0-0.23.3] or uninstalled, leaving only versions: [0.22.1-0.22.5, 0.23.0-0.23.3]
           └─StatsBase [2913bbd2] log:
             ├─possible versions are: [0.24.0, 0.25.0, 0.26.0, 0.27.0, 0.28.0-0.28.1, 0.29.0, 0.30.0, 0.31.0, 0.32.0-0.32.2, 0.33.0-0.33.3] or uninstalled
             └─restricted to versions 0.33 by Flux [587475ba], leaving only versions 0.33.0-0.33.3
               └─Flux [587475ba] log: see above```

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
I'm trying to `dev Flux` but it gives me this error

elements.text: I'm trying to
dev Flux
but it gives me this error
Hm, I’m not sure what
MyExamplePackage
is, but it looks like there might be a conflict with
Metalhead
or
Images

..

Are you doing this in the global/default environment? You might activate another environment with only Flux in it
and see if that still errors. You might also make sure you have the most updated version of Images.

text: <@UGU761DU2> i created myexamplepackage to test things out and i think it doesn't allow images to be updated.. i don't know how to solve it though... i want to send a pr to flux

text: It’s not unusual for the development version of a package to require, e.g., the development version of other packages, so using environments is a must

text: A pr would be welcome, but I think it would be to metalhead updated to use flux master in the manifest.
